version_description:
- New regional content for Taiwan
- Minor bugs fixes

- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes
- UI enhancement
- Added Korean language support

- Added widget support
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

- Personalize your feed with your interests
- Performance improvement
- Bug fixes

- Announcing Drops: keep track and up-to-date with hype upcoming footwear and clothing releases.
- Find out the prices, colors, and where to buy.
- Performance improvement
- Bug fixes

- Announcing Drops: keep track and up-to-date with hype upcoming footwear and clothing releases.
- Find out the prices, colors, and where to buy.
- Bug fixes

- Added Refine function for Drops
- New image gallery view
- Performance improvements
- Bug fixes

- Added the support of French language in the app.
- Added a new function in Drops - You can now able to add the release date to your Calendar.
- Added the support of Facebook commenting for Traditional Chinese and Korean language.

- Added the support of French language in the app.
- Added a new function in Drops - You can now able to add the release date to your Calendar.
- Added the support of Facebook commenting for Traditional Chinese and Korean language.
- Bug fixes

Thanks for using the HYPEBEAST App. In order to provide the best possible experience on the app, we occasionally update the app to improve performance and fix bugs.

If you have any feedback or encounter any issues, please contact us at app@hypebeast.com. If you’re enjoying the app, please leave us a rating and a review.
